Bash(python3 -c "
import urllib.request, json

token = ''ifAcyTLA6z4oi1oOhra9CajW9GozQNGO9Qqx5PGS''
base = ''https://api.eterniasoft.com/v3''

# Get all projects \(paginated\)
projects = []
url = f''{base}/projects''
while url:
    req = urllib.request.Request\(url, headers={''Authorization'': token}\)
    with urllib.request.urlopen\(req, timeout=60\) as resp:
        data = json.loads\(resp.read\(\)\)
        for p in data.get\(''data'', []\):
            projects.append\({''id'': p[''id''], ''name'': p[''attributes''][''name'']}\)
        url = data.get\(''links'', {}\).get\(''next''\)

print\(f''Total proyectos: {len\(projects\)}''\)
print\(\)

# Get units count for each project
total_units = 0
for p in projects:
    try:
        req = urllib.request.Request\(f""{base}/projects/{p[''id'']}/units"", headers={''Authorization'': token}\)
        with urllib.request.urlopen\(req, timeout=60\) as resp:
            data = json.loads\(resp.read\(\)\)
            count = data.get\(''meta'', {}\).get\(''page'', {}\).get\(''total'', 0\)
            total_units += count
            print\(f""  {p[''name'']}: {count} unidades""\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f""  {p[''name'']}: ERROR - {e}""\)

print\(f''\\n=== TOTAL GENERAL: {len\(projects\)} proyectos, {total_units} unidades ===''\)
")
